this_title: Pet Shop Boys Dreamworld: The Greatest Hits Live at the Royal Arena Copenhagen
introduction: 2024 sees the 40th anniversary of Pet Shop Boys and this brand new concert film was captured live from Royal Arena, Copenhagen on 7 July 2023, during the duo's critically acclaimed tour, Dreamworld: The Greatest Hits Live. Dreamworld: The Greatest Hits Live is Pet Shop Boys' first ever greatest hits tour and has seen them receive ecstatic reviews for the shows in the UK and across Europe. Featuring a lavish stage show, full-back up band and mesmerising visual backdrops, Neil Tennant and Chris Lowe put on an uplifting and exhilarating performance to a packed and high-spirited arena audience. With film direction from leading live performance director David Barnard in a 14-camera 4K shoot, the show includes all of Pet Shop Boys' global greatest hits including West End Girls, Suburbia, Opportunities (Let's Make Lots of Money), Left to My Own Devices, Rent, Domino Dancing, Love Comes Quickly, Always on My Mind, What Have I Done to Deserve This and It's a Sin.
chinese_title: Pet Shop Boys Dreamworld: The Greatest Hits Live at the Royal Arena Copenhagen
